response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and my proposal aims to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the value I receive for the product and providing you with an attractive deal that respects its true worth. I believe this price is fair and competitive, allowing you to enjoy substantial savings while securing an asset of great significance. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
